import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { pageTitle } from '../../helper' import Card from '../Card' import Cta from '../Cta' import PageHeading from '../PageHeading' import Div from '../Div' import SectionHeading from '../SectionHeading' import Spacing from '../Spacing' export default function ServicesPage() { pageTitle('Service'); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) return ( <>
) }
